alert.note: Alert for Gibson; Vanderburgh; Warrick (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 28 at 3:01AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Warrick, northeastern Vanderburgh and southeastern Gibson Counties through 230 AM CDT... At 201 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Haubstadt, or near Fort Branch, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Lynnville around 215 AM CDT. This includes the following highways... Interstate 69 in Indiana between Mile Markers 17 and 28. Interstate 64 in Indiana between Mile Markers 19 and 38. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
